Tasks.Task: Set up source code control system
Tasks.Task Description: Set up either GitHub or Azure Repos for your source code control system. This choice will determine your choice of pipeline runner as well. GitHub can use Azure Pipelines or GitHub Actions, whereas Azure Repos must use Azure Pipelines.

Tasks.Task: Set up Azure API Management service
Tasks.Task Description: Set up an Azure API Management service for each API developer so that they can develop API definitions along with the API service. Use the consumption or developer SKU when creating the service.
Use policy fragments to reduce the new policy that developers need to write for each API.
Use named values and backends to ensure that policies are generic and can apply to any API Management instance.
Use the Azure APIOps Toolkit to extract a working API definition from the developer service.
Set up an API approval process that runs on each pull request. The API approval process should include breaking change detection, linting, and automated API testing.
Use the Azure APIOps Toolkit publisher to publish the API to your production API Management service.
Create an Azure API Management instance by using the Azure portal.
Create or invite developers to manage user accounts in Azure API Management.
Customize the look and feel of the developer portal by adding custom content, customizing styles, and adding branding.
Integrate Azure Key Vault for secure safekeeping and management of client certificates and secrets.
Use Azure Monitor for logging, reporting, and alerting on management operations, systems events, and API requests.
Integrate Application Insights for live metrics, end-to-end tracing, and troubleshooting.
Use virtual networks, private endpoints, and Application Gateway for network-level protection.
Integrate Microsoft Entra ID for developer authentication and request authorization.
Use Event Hubs for streaming events.
Deploy the API definition using Azure APIOps Toolkit, dotnet-apim, or Terraform based on the tool used to produce the API definition.

Tasks.Task: Manage API Management with Azure Automation
Tasks.Task Description: Use Windows PowerShell cmdlets for Azure API Management API within Azure Automation to perform API Management tasks.
